overview: After the death of her mother and grandmother, Inti inherits a house in the country side, where she goes with her friends to relax when she finds out her boyfriend is cheating on her with another man. Following the sudden visit of a weird neihgbor, Inti realizes something strange is happening. While she and her friends start to drink and have fun, three local guys, including the weird neighbor, decide to pay them a visit, at the same time tension begins to rise inside the group of friends.
title: Mercury Retrograde
